THIS Institution will be opened on Monday


the 22r. Of October Inst, under the care


ofthe Rev. JosrpH Wilson.


In this Seminary students will be thoroughly in
srnctrd in the different branches Of good English
and Classical EAnca,ion, VIZ Reading, Writing
arithmetic, English tirammar, Geography, Compo-
,ition. Elocuon, Mathematics, and the Greek and
Latin Languages. The terms of tuition will be; for
the En- .sh branches. exclusive Of Mathematics.
S8 per session, or SO. including the Mathematics;
for the Languages, Including the English, $40 per
session. Tuition money to be paid in advance.
There will be two sessions in the year, with d
short vacation between each.


Good boarding can be obtaiued in respectable
families in the village, at the rate Of Forty Dollars
per session and Il few hoarders can be accommo.
dated in the family of the Principal


JOHN EDDOWES Sec'y.
